private $referer
The value of the HTTP Referer header, if none set, the header is not sent.
public function reload()
Loads all the current settings from the database into the settings attribute.

$subaction_name)

public function return_action($action_name =  null)
Returns the requested action, the first index contains the callback, the second contains the file to be included before calling on the callback, unless it is null.
public function return_group($group_identifier =  null)
Returns the specified group name, or if no group identifier is supplied, all groups are returned.
public function return_subaction($action_name,  
$subaction_name =  null)
Returns the requested subaction, the first index contains the callback, the second contains the file to be included before calling on the callback, unless it is null.
public function run_hook($hook_name,  
$args =  null)
Runs the specified hook, along with running the registered callbacks of the hook.

abstract public function table_sql($table,  
$drop_if_exists =  true,
$file =  null)
Generates the CREATE TABLE command for the specified table, if $file is specified, append that data to the specified file and return a bool (TRUE on success, FALSE on failure), otherwise return the string containing the CREATE TABLE.
abstract public function tables()
Returns an array containing all the tables in the database.
This is an abstract class that a theme extends, and implements header and footer, but also incorporates the information that is gathered and stored within the arrays contained inside this class definition.

The maximum number of seconds that the downloading can take.
